nsp.impl.output

Class OutputWriter_RasterCover

  • java.lang.Object
    • nsp.impl.output.OutputWriter_RasterCover
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OutputWriter

    public class OutputWriter_RasterCover
extends java.lang.Object
implements OutputWriter
    Writes a RasterMosaic object to an ASCII output file.

        Specified by:

      • writeHeader

        public void writeHeader(boolean writeHeader)
        Sets whether the ESRI ASCII header should be added to the file or not. Having a header is useful for viewing in GIS. No header is useful if importing files into R or Matlab.
        Specified by:
        writeHeader in interface OutputWriter
